body.p: Born in 1835 in Florida. Married to Mary E. Rousseau. Joined the U.S. army as 1st Lieutenant on May 14, 1861. Transferred to 5th cavalry June 22, 1861 and became a captain on July 17, 1862. Colonel of 20th infantry on July 28, 1863. Brigadier-general March 13, 1865. Mustered out on September 1, 1866. Died on March 29, 1868.
